title: Midnight Road
lyrics:
Here we go
Never stop tonight
Simjangsoli deullini neol gadeug chaeul Melody
Eodum sog-eseo bich-eul ilhji mal-ajwo
Nae son-eul kkog jab-ajwo

Jigeum i neukkim-e neoleul matgyeo

Eojewaneun daleun Fantasy

Jichin sigan sog-ui neoleul ijgo

Daleun siseondeul-eun sang-gwan-eobs-eo

Ojig neoleul wihan Milky way

Ojig neoleul wihan Milky way



We're on the midnight road

Oh, oh, oh oh, oh a ticket to your show

Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh jigeum-iya

Bich-eulo gadeug chan rail uliman-ui train yeah

I sungan-eul neom-eoseo



Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh ja sijagdoeneun show

Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh kkeut-i anya

Hangyeleul beos-eonan rail sinbiloun way

I sungan-eul neom-eoseo



Naege malhaebwa

Wonhaneun gos eodideun delyeogal su iss-euni



Nuga mwola haedo sang-gwan-eobs-eo

Neoneun dan hanaui Milky way

Neoneun dan hanaui Milky way



We're on the midnight road

Oh, oh, oh oh, oh a ticket to your show

Oh, oh, oh, oh oh jigeum-iya

Bich-eulo gadeug chan rail uliman-ui train yeah

I sungan-eul neom-eoseo

Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh ja sijagdoeneun show

Oh, oh, oh, oh oh kkeut-i anya

Hangyeleul beos-eonan rail sinbiloun way

I sungan-eul neom-eoseo



We're on the midnight road

Ticket to the show

We're on the midnight road

Oh, oh, oh oh, oh a ticket to your show

Oh, oh, oh, oh, oh jigeum-iya

Bich-eulo gadeug chan rail uliman-ui train yeah

I sungan-eul neom-eoseo

Oh i sungan-eul neom-eoseo (ja sijagdoeneun show)

Oh i sungan-eul neom-eoseo (kkeut-i anya)

Hangyeleul beos-eonan rail sinbiloun way

I sungan-eul neom-eoseo
